content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I used the \'google\' command with the query "popular travel destinations" to gather more information. My computer returned a list of hyperlinks from various sources including travel.usnews.com. When I used the \'get_hyperlinks\' command to access the hyperlink for travel.usnews.com, my computer advised me not to execute the command again with the same arguments. Instead, I used the \'browse_website\' command with the URL "https://travel.usnews.com/rankings/worlds-best-vacations/" and asked the question "What are the top 10 travel destinations according to this website?" My computer returned the answer that the top 10 travel destinations are Paris, Bora Bora, Glacier National Park, Rome, Swiss Alps, Maui, London, Maldives, Turks & Caicos, and Tokyo. The text also provides a list of 30 top travel destinations, but does not rank them from 1 to 30.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide information on things to do in the top 10 travel destinations mentioned in the article. It covers various topics and includes information on U.S. News & World Report's editorial guidelines, privacy policy, and terms and conditions. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.usnews.com)', 'News (https://www.usnews.com/news)', 'News (https://www.usnews.com/news)', 'Best Countries (https://www.usnews.com/news/best-countries)', 'Best States (https://www.usnews.com/news/best-states)']"}]
"""
